option.value:
Enum_Classe.Assassin|true|Assassins leap to the farthest enemy at the start of combat and deal additional Critical Strike Damage.|3|+125% critical strike damage|6|+350% critical strike damage|-2| || Enum_Classe.Blademaster|true|Blademasters have a 35% chance to strike additional times each attack.|3|One Extra Attack|6|Two Extra Attack|9|Four Extra Attack|| Enum_Classe.Brawler|true|Brawlers receive bonus maximum health.|2|300 Bonus Health|4|700 Bonus Health|6|1200 Bonus Health|| Enum_Classe.Elementalist|true|Elementalists gain double mana from attacks.|3|At the start of combat, summon a Golem with 2200 HP|-1||-2| || Enum_Classe.Guardian|true||2|At the start of combat, all adjacent allies receive +50 armor per stack. Guardians don't buff themselves|-1||-2| || Enum_Classe.Gunslinger|true|After attacking, Gunslingers have a 50% chance to fire additional attacks.|2|Attack 1 other enemy|4|Attack 2 other enemy|6|Attack 3 other enemy|| Enum_Classe.Knight|true|All allies ignore damage.|2|15 Damage Ignored|4|30 Damage Ignored|6|55 Damage Ignored|| Enum_Classe.Ranger|true|Rangers have a chance to double their attack speed for the next 3s.|2|25% Chance to Double Attack Speed|4|65% Chance to Double Attack Speed|-2| || Enum_Classe.Shapeshifter|true|Shapeshifters gain bonus maximum Health when they transform.|3|60% Bonus Maximum Health|6|120% Bonus Maximum Health|-2| || Enum_Classe.Sorcerer|true|Sorcerers gain double mana from attacking and allies have increased spell damage.|3|+45% spell damage|6|+100% spell damage|-2| ||
Enum_Classe.Demon|false|Attacks from Demons have a chance to burn all of an enemy's mana and deal that much true damage.|2|20% Chance to Mana Burn|4|35% Chance to Mana Burn|6|60% Chance to Mana Burn|| Enum_Classe.Dragon|false||2|Dragons are 83% immune to Magic damage|-1||-2| || Enum_Classe.Exile|false||1|If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat|they gain a shield equal to 100% of their maximum health|-1||-2| || Enum_Classe.Glacial|false|Attacks from Glacials have a chance to stun for 2s.|2|20% Chance to Stun|4|30% Chance to Stun|6|45% Chance to Stun|| Enum_Classe.Imperial|false|Imperials deal Double Damage.|2|One Random Imperial|4|All Imperials|-2| || Enum_Classe.Noble|false|+60 Armor and Magic Resist. Heal 35 health per attack.|3|One Random Ally|6|All Allies|-2| || Enum_Classe.Ninja|false|The Ninja Trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 Ninjas.|1|Ninja gains +40 Attack Damage and Ability Power|4|All Ninjas gain +60 Attack Damage and Ability Power|-2| || Enum_Classe.Pirate|false||3|Earn up to 4 additional gold after combat against another player|-1||-2| || Enum_Classe.Phantom|false||2|Curse a random enemy at the start of combat, setting their HP to 100|-1||-2| || Enum_Classe.Robot|false||1|Robots start combat at full mana|-1||-2| || Enum_Classe.Void|false||3|Void units now deal True Damage|-1||-2| || Enum_Classe.Wild|false|Attacks generate stacks of Fury (stacks up to 5 times). Each stack of Fury gives 10% Attack Speed.|2|Wild Allies Only|4|All Allies|-2| || Enum_Classe.Yordle|false|Attack against ally Yordles have a chance to miss. Also dodges On-hit effects.|3|30% Chance to Miss|6|55% Chance to Miss|-2| Enum_Classe.Hextech|false|When combat begins, launch a pulse bomb that disables items for some time.|2|5 seconds|4|15 seconds|-2|

Blade of the Ruined King|Enum_Item.BladeoftheRuinedKing|Enum_Item.Spatula|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Wearer is also a Blademaster.|| Bloodthirster|Enum_Item.Bloodthirster|Enum_Item.BFSword|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Attacks heal for 50% of damage.|| Cursed Blade|Enum_Item.CursedBlade|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Attacks have a low chance to Shrink (Reduce enemy's star level by 1).|| Darkin|Enum_Item.Darkin|Enum_Item.Spatula|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|Wearer is also a Demon.|| Dragon's Claw|Enum_Item.DragonsClaw|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Gain 83% resistance to magic damage.|| Force of Nature|Enum_Item.ForceofNature|Enum_Item.Spatula|Enum_Item.Spatula|Gain +1 team size.|| Frozen Heart|Enum_Item.FrozenHeart|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|Adjacent enemies lose 20% Attack Speed.|| Frozen Mallet|Enum_Item.FrozenMallet|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Enum_Item.Spatula|Wearer is also a Glacial.|| Guardian Angel|Enum_Item.GuardianAngel|Enum_Item.BFSword|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Wearer revives with 1000 Health after a 2 sec delay.|| Guinsoo's Rageblade|Enum_Item.GuinsoosRageblade|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Attacks grant 4% Attack Speed. Stacks infinitely.|| Hextech Gunblade|Enum_Item.HextechGunblade|Enum_Item.BFSword|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|Heal for 25% of all damage dealt.|| Hush|Enum_Item.Hush|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|Attacks have a high chance to Silence.|| Infinity Edge|Enum_Item.InfinityEdge|Enum_Item.BFSword|Enum_Item.BFSword|Critical Strikes deal +150% damage.|| Ionic Spark|Enum_Item.IonicSpark|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Whenever an enemy casts a spell, they take 150 true damage.|| Knight's Vow|Enum_Item.KnightsVow|Enum_Item.Spatula|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Wearer is also a Knight.|| Locket of the Iron Solari|Enum_Item.LocketoftheIronSolari|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|On start of combat, allies two spaces to the left and right gain a shield of 250 for 4 seconds.|| Luden's Echo|Enum_Item.LudensEcho|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|Spells deal 200 splash damage on hit.|| Morellonomicon|Enum_Item.Morellonomicon|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|Spells deal burn damage equal to 5% of the enemy's max HP per second.|| Phantom Dancer|Enum_Item.PhantomDancer|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Wearer dodges all Critical Strikes.|| Rabadon's Deathcap|Enum_Item.RabadonsDeathcap|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|+50% Ability Power.|| Rapid Firecannon|Enum_Item.RapidFirecannon|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Wearer's attacks cannot be dodged. Attack Range is doubled.|| Red Buff|Enum_Item.RedBuff|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Attacks deal 2.5% burn damage.|| Redemption|Enum_Item.Redemption|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|Upon reaching 25% health, heal all nearby allies for 1000 Health.|| Runaan's Hurricane|Enum_Item.RunaansHurricane|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Enum_Item.Spatula|Attacks 1 extra targets on attack. Extra attacks deal 25% damage. Applies on-hit effects.|| Seraph's Embrace|Enum_Item.SeraphsEmbrace|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|Regain 20 mana each time a spell is cast.|| Spear of Shojin|Enum_Item.SpearofShojin|Enum_Item.BFSword|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|After casting, wearer gains 15% of its max mana per attack.|| Statikk Shiv|Enum_Item.StatikkShiv|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Enum_Item.TearoftheGoddess|Every 3rd attack deals 90 splash magical damage to 3 additional targets.|| Sword Breaker|Enum_Item.SwordBreaker|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Attacks have a chance to disarm.|| Sword of the Divine|Enum_Item.SwordoftheDivine|Enum_Item.BFSword|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Each second, the wearer has a 5% chance to gain 100% Critical Strike.|| Thornmail|Enum_Item.Thornmail|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Enum_Item.ChainVest|Reflect 100% of mitigated damage taken from attacks as true damage.|| Titanic Hydra|Enum_Item.TitanicHydra|Enum_Item.RecurveBow|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Attacks deal 10% of the wearer's max Health as splash damage.|| Warmog's Armor|Enum_Item.WarmogsArmor|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Wearer regenerates 6% of missing health per second.|| Youmuu's Ghostblade|Enum_Item.YoumuusGhostblade|Enum_Item.BFSword|Enum_Item.Spatula|Wearer is also an Assassin.|| Yuumi|Enum_Item.Yuumi|Enum_Item.Spatula|Enum_Item.NeedlesslyLargeRod|Wearer is also a Sorcerer..|| Zeke's Herald|Enum_Item.ZekesHerald|Enum_Item.BFSword|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Allies two spaces to the left and right gain +15% Attack Speed.|| Zephyr|Enum_Item.Zephyr|Enum_Item.GiantsBelt|Enum_Item.NegatronCloak|On start of combat, banish an enemy for 5 seconds.
